eventName: Adventure That Cannot Wait for the Sun
storyInfo: At the announcement of the competition results, the first place winner forfeits, leaving Pepe and Aspasia without their desired prizes. Narantuya decides to use the gem Aspasia won as bait for Pepe, but unexpectedly, the gem lands in Medjehtiqedti's hands.

attributes.text: ♪The papyrus reeds sway by the river, its waters of purest lazurite♪
♪It wends its way by the golden dunes, fed by our gifts of gems♪
♪May I see Him by the waterside, may I follow Him to eternity♪

attributes.content: Amidst the ardent applause and passionate singing, the winners stiffly walk along the shining, bejeweled street.
A reed boat bearing the heavy weight of history slowly sinks into the river. Golden slipper and Minoan silver medal alike become no more than a string of bubbles.
Regret? How could I possibly have any regrets? Meeting you has been the best thing to happen to me this entire competition, Hatshepsut Hanim!
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: What worth would a competition ranking hold compared to such privilege...? If I may be so bold, I believe a group photo of us losers with the champion would be fittingly commemorative.
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: Would you do me the honor of having a photo with me, resplendent Hatshepsut Hanim? If you would hold the first-place prize statue as well, that would be perfect.
attributes.name: Rashad

attributes.content: Haha, of course... Thank you for your kind words...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I joined in a most absurd competition.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Yeah, that was absurd indeed.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I intended to seek history, honor the feats of heroes past, be steadfast in my pursuit of victory, and confront fate itself.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Yeah, confronting fate and... the other thing. Basically, your ten old silver medals are a single shiny new one.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: But don't worry. This is Sargon, after all, so that's no failure.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: 'Golden sands above, gold itself below.' As the lords ameer and padishahs say, sand can be as precious as gold.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Don't sweat it. Maybe you'll go down some windy road, you'll find yourself recognized, and that golden cup will be handed right over.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Handed over?
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Let's say, maybe you were to chat with the lucky winner of the cup, and wheedle your way into his trust...
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: —You're right!
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: The treasure I put forth was recognized. This means that Minoan culture itself was also recognized.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Even if the assessment of the judges was strikingly superficial, the scoring of the silver medals and my position are sufficient proof that even Sargonian historians hold a basic respect for Minos.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: I should have words with the collector of the goblet. If he were to understand the deep history behind it, perhaps he would be willing to sell it back to me at a price I can afford.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: You call that recognition?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Well, if it's enough to cheer you up, I guess we'll call that a victory.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Thank you very much, Narantuya. You are too kind.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Just like the wise men debating around the white columns, you have awoken me. I will not lose the honor that those silver medals represented. In fact, I have now won even more in turn.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: The trick played upon me by fate is unworthy of notice, by comparison.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: Moreover, if immersing those medals in the water would aid the people to see what they wish to see, then I am happy to serve.
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: If throwing this gem into the river would summon the god I've heard so much talk of, then I—
attributes.name: Aspasia

attributes.content: WAIT!
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I can see you're feeling a bit better, but calm down. Don't throw it away.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I have a plan... Or I guess, I have a person I wish to see.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: If you don't really care about the gem, could I... borrow it for a while?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: The traps are ready.
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Relax, I was real careful putting them together. The more someone knows, the less they'll suspect.
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I also slipped the invitation into the girl's bag. I made sure to wear gloves for handling artifacts, no way I left any fingerprints behind.
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: Nice work.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I'll handle the back end of our plan. Any questions from you two?
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: I have one! I don't understand why the Padishah's daughter would fall for our bait?
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: This gem doesn't seem that special. It's got lots of impurities, like the stone Ajani and I pulled up from the sewer the other day...
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: Don't worry about what the rich folk think.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Watch the door tonight. Keep your eyes peeled. Don't let her send anyone over to take it before the time is right.
attributes.name: Narantuya

attributes.content: Yeah, okay... We won't let you down this time.
attributes.name: Ajazi

attributes.content: That's right! We won't let anyone in!
attributes.name: Ajani

attributes.content: Meow?
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Mio arrives before the table, having deftly avoided every snare in the heavily-trapped room.
The glimmering gem on the table is reflected in the cloudbeast's bright eyes.
An anonymous letter, alongside an indistinct photo of the gem. The letter specifies a time and place for you to be, alone.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: An incredibly obvious trap. You should not go, Pepe.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Well, I have to go. How else am I supposed to get the gem?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: But what?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You agreed to take me to the man-made lake in the city tonight.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Did I say that? Or maybe you misremembered and it's actually tomorrow night?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Ever since my brain was replaced, I have not misremembered a single thing.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: If that's true, you would have remembered where all the gems were.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You could ask Anat. She wrote a loooooot of official-looking documents about you lately.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I also have a few observational reports and paragraphs of a draft for a paper on this ancient general, actually.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Maybe she can take you there.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: ...I might need to take a few more shifts, if so.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Do you really have no idea who sent this letter?
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: The tourist who got second place seemed like a nice lady.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I might have been too easy to read at the Harvest Gathering. Everyone could probably tell I wanted the gem.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: But we need it to get more information out of Zubayr. Whether it's info on my hidden treasure or data for your thesis.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Even so, I advise you not to take the risk.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Even if I've been across all of Sargon by now?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I do recall you nearly failing to make it back twice when we were still in school. Good thing Titi and I decided to look for you both times.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Oh yeah. You recruited a team of adventurers on burdenbeasts to find me, all so I could judge which of the two of you translated some ancient document more accurately.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: If Titi was here, I might have some backing on going to the meet-up spot.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Good thing she isn't here.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: ...She's not? Where is she, then?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: 'Cause inconvenience'... She said that like I was out to mess things up for her.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: *sigh* I helped her out with all the documents before. She wouldn't faint from all the pressure at the office, right?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: —! Wh-What was that noise?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: If you're my cute little jewel construct, then come out like a good kid. No need to freak me out...
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti
Medjehtiqedti
attributes.content: I'm going to count to three. If you're not out by then, I'm going to use my Arts on you. You've been warned.

attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti
attributes.content: One, two... three!
Meow—!!!
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Oh, darn it! It's you again, little cloudbeast!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Sorry, buddy. Do forgive me. *sigh* Alright, here, some pats on the head, please don't get mad.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I know you're a bit of a bad-tempered scratcher, but let me explain! I've got a good reason for being a bit jittery today!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Meow...
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: Do you still remember when we were all at the museum earlier? I got freaked out by a bunch of things suddenly jumping all over the place.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: ...And then, today, I got in another fight with Anat.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Please, please, please don't be as mad at me as her, you cute little cloudbeast you.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: (Purring)
attributes.name: Mio

attributes.content: *sigh*...
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I know, I know, we're always getting into fights—over academic matters, of course.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I know that she really wants to publish her research for everyone to see.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I also know that it's not easy to get the opportunity to hold a special exhibit like this, so she's being real cautious, and also kinda overstressed...
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: So stressed that in the end, she didn't dare press on with her original goal.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: It's obvious I'm trying to make sure she doesn't give up on the special exhibit, right?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Medjehtiqedti unconsciously speeds up her cloudbeast petting.
As she does, Mio purrs louder and louder.
But the girl pays no heed. She is lost in her thoughts, petting and petting and petting and petting...
She used to be real quiet in the past. Whenever she was nervous, her arms and legs would flail about.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Whenever she'd have to give a speech, everyone would be snickering at her by the end of it.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: But even if her voice was overpowered by the laughter, she would persevere and finish her speech.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: *sigh* If only I could just rub her ears to give her the courage to persevere in other things.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Medjehtiqedti cups the cloudbeast's face in her hands and rubs it vigorously as she vents her feelings, without the slightest bit of interest in why the cloudbeast is purring so loudly.
Suddenly, she feels a warmth in the palm of her hand.
Whoa! Was that a hairball?! Don't spit it on my sleeve!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: —Eh?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: A jewel?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Maybe I could go to the meet-up spot alone, but with a monitoring device hidden on me. We could get some private security to lie in ambush nearby.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: It's far too last-minute for that, Pepe. Security companies won't have the manpower on the eve of the Flood Festival, not to mention you can't negotiate with them in the middle of the night.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Well... How about renting an aircraft to support me if needed?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Such a flying object would be rather suspicious.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: I could smash the door in with my hammer, give them a good fright?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: That does seem like it could work...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: ...But would that not be damaging a historical building?
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: *cough* I guess that would be a debatable too. Though I'm not sure any building is anywhere near as historical as you...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: I am rather fond of what the people who came after me have left behind—
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Good! Evening! Everyoneeeeeee!
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Oh? You're here too, Pepe? Perfect.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Can you all guess what I just ran into on the road earlier?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Good timing, Titi! We've been discussing something really important, and I need your support here—
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Quick, help me make Pepe see sense.
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: If this was an opportunity to excavate an important historical site, would you just give up because you were in a bit of danger?
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: You of all should know that an excavation requires patience! You're just eager to prove yourself against your brother right now! This is all just...
attributes.name: Anat

attributes.content: Wow, you're really not pulling any punches this time around, Anat...
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: *sigh* Nobody going to take a guess?
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Your clothes are covered in fur.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: Thank you for indulging me, Zubayr Effendi. Correct, I ran into a little cloudbeast.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: In my age, the people believed that cloudbeasts were bringers of good fortune.
attributes.name: Zubayr

attributes.content: It turns out that in this age, I'm a believer too.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: It spit out a gemstone full of luck for me.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: ...A what?!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Let me see, please!
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: Hold it.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Anat says you agreed to invest in a new exhibition hall in return for her lending you a gem out of the museum collection.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Alright, I hear you, I'll make an investment in your name.
attributes.name: Pepe

attributes.content: No, Pepe.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I hope you... No, all of you will agree with me on something else.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: Pepe, Anat and... Zubayr Effendi.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti

attributes.content: I think this jewel can grant our wishes.
attributes.name: Medjehtiqedti
